verses.verse: And as they <S%G1448>approached<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> at <S%G967>Bethphage<s%> and <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> <S%G4314>near<s%> the <S%G3735>Mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives,<s%> He <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>

and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5217>"Go<s%> into the <S%G2968>village<s%> <S%G2713>opposite<s%> you, and <S%G2117>immediately<s%> as you <S%G1531>enter<s%> it, you will <S%G2147>find<s%> a <S%G4454>colt<s%> <S%G1210>tied<s%> [there,] on <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G444>one<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G3768>yet<s%> has <S%G3768>ever<s%> <S%G2523>sat;<s%> <S%G3089>untie<s%> it and <S%G5342>bring<s%> it [here.]

"And <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to you, <S%G5101>'Why<s%> are you <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%>?' you <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of it'; and <S%G2117>immediately<s%> he will <S%G649>send<s%> it <S%G3825>back<s%> <S%G5602>here.<s%>"

And they <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> a <S%G4454>colt<s%> <S%G1210>tied<s%> at the <S%G2374>door<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> in the <S%G296>street;<s%> and they <S%G3089>untied<s%> it.
And <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G1563>bystanders<s%> <S%G2476><s%> were <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"What<s%> are you <S%G4160>doing,<s%> <S%G3089>untying<s%> the <S%G4454>colt<s%>?"
And they <S%G3004>spoke<s%> to them <S%G2531>just<s%> as <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G3004>told<s%> [them,] and they <S%G863>gave<s%> them <S%G863>permission.<s%>
And they <S%G5342>brought<s%> the <S%G4454>colt<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and <S%G1911>put<s%> their <S%G2440>garments<s%> on it; and He <S%G2523>sat<s%> upon it.

And <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4766>spread<s%> their <S%G2440>garments<s%> in the <S%G3598>road,<s%> and <S%G243>others<s%> [spread] <S%G4742>leafy<s%> <S%G4742>branches<s%> which they had <S%G2875>cut<s%> from the <S%G68>fields.<s%>

And <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4254>went<s%> <S%G4254>before,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G190>followed<s%> after, were <S%G2896>crying<s%> out, <S%G5614>"Hosanna!<s%> <S%G2127>Blessed<s%> is He who <S%G2064>comes<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%>
<S%G2127>Blessed<s%> [is] the <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of our <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G7035>David;<s%> <S%G5614>Hosanna<s%> in the <S%G5310>highest!<s%>"

And He <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> [and came] into the <S%G2413>temple;<s%> and after <S%G4017>looking<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4017>around,<s%> He <S%G1831>departed<s%> for <S%G963>Bethany<s%> with the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> since it was <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G3796>late.<s%>
And on the <S%G1887>next<s%> <S%G1887>day,<s%> when they had <S%G1831>departed<s%> from <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> He became <S%G3983>hungry.<s%>

And <S%G3708>seeing<s%> at a <S%G3113>distance<s%> a <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree<s%> in <S%G5444>leaf,<s%> He <S%G2064>went<s%> [to see] <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G686>perhaps<s%> He would <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> on it; and when He <S%G2064>came<s%> to it, He <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> but <S%G5444>leaves,<s%> for it was not the <S%G2540>season<s%> for <S%G4810>figs.<s%>

And He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to it, "May <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G1519>ever<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> from you <S%G3371>again!<s%>" And His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G191>listening.<s%>

And they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%> And He <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G2413>temple<s%> and <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G59>buying<s%> and <S%G4453>selling<s%> in the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> and <S%G2690>overturned<s%> the <S%G5132>tables<s%> of the <S%G2855>moneychangers<s%> and the <S%G2515>seats<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G4453>selling<s%> <S%G4058>doves;<s%>
and He would not <S%G863>permit<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> to <S%G1308>carry<s%> <S%G4632>goods<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2413>temple.<s%>

And He [began] to <S%G1321>teach<s%> and <S%G3004>say<s%> to them, "Is it not <S%G1125>written,<s%> 'My <S%G3624>house<s%> shall be <S%G2564>called<s%> a <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G4335>prayer<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%>'? But you have <S%G4160>made<s%> it a robbers' <S%G4693>den.<s%>"

And the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> [this], and [began] <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> Him; for they were <S%G5399>afraid<s%> of Him, for <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> was <S%G1605>astonished<s%> at His <S%G1322>teaching.<s%>
And <S%G3752>whenever<s%> <S%G3796>evening<s%> <S%G1096>came,<s%> they would <S%G1607>go<s%> out of the <S%G4172>city.<s%>
And as they were <S%G3899>passing<s%> by in the <S%G4404>morning,<s%> they <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree<s%> <S%G3583>withered<s%> from the <S%G4491>roots<s%> [up.]

And being <S%G363>reminded,<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G4461>"Rabbi,<s%> <S%G2396>behold,<s%> the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> You <S%G2672>cursed<s%> has <S%G3583>withered.<s%>"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G2192>"Have<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> 'Be <S%G142>taken<s%> up and <S%G906>cast<s%> into the <S%G2281>sea,<s%>' and does not <S%G1252>doubt<s%> in his <S%G2588>heart,<s%> but <S%G4100>believes<s%> that <S%G3739>what<s%> he <S%G2980>says<s%> is going to <S%G1096>happen,<s%> it shall be [granted] him.

<S%G1223>"Therefore<s%> <S%G3778><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> for <S%G3745>which<s%> you <S%G4336>pray<s%> and <S%G154>ask,<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> that you have <S%G2983>received<s%> them, and they shall be [granted] you.

"And <S%G3752>whenever<s%> you <S%G4739>stand<s%> <S%G4336>praying,<s%> <S%G863>forgive,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G5100>anyone;<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that your <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> may <S%G863>forgive<s%> you your <S%G3900>transgressions.<s%>

["But <S%G1487>if<s%> you do not <S%G863>forgive,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> will your <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> your <S%G3900>transgressions.<s%>"]

And they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%> And as He was <S%G4043>walking<s%> in the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests,<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> and <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to Him,

and [began] <S%G3004>saying<s%> to Him, "By <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> are You <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> You <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%>?"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "I will <S%G1905>ask<s%> you <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3056>question,<s%> and you <S%G611>answer<s%> Me, and [then] I will <S%G3004>tell<s%> you by <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>
"Was the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> from <S%G444>men<s%>? <S%G611>Answer<s%> Me."

And they [began] <S%G1260>reasoning<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> we <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'From <S%G3772>heaven,<s%>' He will <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3767>'Then<s%> <S%G1223>why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> did you not <S%G4100>believe<s%> him?'

"But shall we <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'From <S%G444>men<s%>'?" â€“ they were <S%G5399>afraid<s%> of the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> for <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G2192>considered<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> to have <S%G1510>been<s%> a <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G3689>indeed.<s%>

And <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> they <S%G3004>said,<s%> "We do not <S%G3609>know.<s%>" And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3761>"Neither<s%> will I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you by <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>"
